nodes.text: 327-A was a Corellian Engineering Corporation Assassin-class corvette operated by the Galactic Empire. It was part of Admiral Wooyou Senn's Task Force Vengeance.
During a reprisal raid against the Airam X7 Factory Gallofree at the Mobetta system, the 327-A, 327-B and 327-C were assigned to attack the factory and the transports evacuating it.
